body_html:
Some benchmark numbers from running 10 forward/backward passes on ResNet-50. Baseline is 75s, 313s for (1, 64) respectively.

Threadpool Size Re-use Workspace Buffers batch size = 1 batch size = 64
4 no 72.09 317.51
16 no 54.79 248.55
4 yes 32.93 306.92
16 yes 21.77 207.45
24 yes 24.22 199.1

body:
Some benchmark numbers from running 10 forward/backward passes on ResNet-50. Baseline is 75s, 313s for (1, 64) respectively.

| Threadpool Size | Re-use Workspace Buffers | batch size = 1 | batch size = 64 |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------| ---------------| ----------------|
| 4 | no | 72.09 | 317.51 |
| 16 | no | 54.79 | 248.55 |
| 4 | yes | 32.93 | 306.92 |
| 16 | yes | 21.77 | 207.45 |
| 24 | yes | 24.22 | 199.1 |
